ingredients.item: 150g pack essential Waitrose Cooked King Prawns
185g pack Waitrose Spiralized Butternut Spaghetti (selected stores)
½ x 25g pack parsley, roughly chopped

instructions.step: Heat 1 tsp oil in a frying pan and fry the breadcrumbs and sesame seeds for 1-2 minutes until golden and crispy. Remove and set aside. Heat the remaining oil, add the chilli and prawns, and fry for 2 minutes.
Meanwhile, microwave the butternut spaghetti according to the pack instructions and stir into the prawns.
Scatter over the breadcrumbs and the parsley, and serve with a squeeze of lime.
